articles.author: Dalia Faheid, Zoe Sottile
articles.title: Restorations are ongoing after global tech outage strands thousands at airports, disrupts hospitals and public services - CNN
articles.description: Operations are gradually being restored but delays are expected after “the largest IT outage in history” disrupted sectors across the globe.
articles.content: Operations are gradually being restored but delays continue for a second day after the largest IT outage in history disrupted sectors across the globe, leaving thousands of passengers stranded at air… [+9913 chars]
